subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which historic palace served as the residence of Maharaja Mansingh I during the construction of Amber Fort?

options_en.explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.
Alwar is a town but not a capital.
Jodhpur is the capital of Jodhpur district in Rajasthan.
Udaipur is a city in Rajasthan but not a capital.
Ajmer is a town and holy city in Rajasthan.
